title: My pixel 4a starting to slow down.when I touch any apps it will only load after 2sec.so what to do
content: My pixel 4a is running so slow.if we select any app it will only load after 2 sec.when I restart the mobile it will properly after some time it does like same (slow down).Also the phone battery is draining too much.i buyed this phone around 1month only.so the pixel 4a is the worst phone that I ever had.waste of money.if anyone is seeing this please help me.when I am writing my exam.it slows too much
